front.title: •Mostly Armless
front.gametext: If your character with a lightsaber just won a battle, deploy on an opponent's character present. Character is Disarmed (power -1 and may no longer carry weapons). Opponent loses 1 Force at the end of each opponent's turns. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: One lesson learned in Jedi training is that when you have been injured, don't panic.

rulings: Character loses all weapons, including permanent weapons.
If Mostly Armless is removed, any permanent weapon(s) are restored.
